title: Poll Admin
description: Receive notifications for your own polls.

types.title: New Participant
types.description: Someone has participated in one of your polls.

types.title: New Comment
types.description: Someone has commented in one of your polls.

title: Participant
description: Receive notifications for polls you participated in.

types.title: Own Vote
types.description: You have voted in a poll.

types.title: Poll updated
types.description: The available options of a poll have changed and you can review your choices.

types.title: Poll concluded
types.description: The admin has concluded the poll and booked appointments.
